item.title: Hello there!
item.dc:creator: ashbb
item.content:encoded:
At last, I found a solution to display the Lessons of Hackety Hack with Green Shoes.

Look at this code.

HH uses a module to change the styles of TextBlock (title, para, etc.) locally.

Now I can also use this magic with Green Shoes.

It took about for a week to understand the magic, though. :-P
